question: Who received the best actor (male) award in the Dadasaheb Phalke Excellence Awards 2018?
explanation: Shahid Kapoor, received the best actor (male) award in the Dadasaheb Phalke Excellence Awards 2018 along with Kartik Aaryan, Sanjay Dutt. Anushka Sharma won the 'Path breaking producer of the year' award with her brother Karnesh.
